name: Halloumi with Zoodles
instructions:
Make the zoodles, slice the halloumi and chop the tomatoes. Fry the zoodles and halloumi in ghee for a few minutes. Dish up and enjoy!

Ghee can be substituted with olive oil or butter.
instructions-extended:
Health tip: If you want to add good fibres to your meal serve with quinoa or amara (approximately 1dl as dry)

Health tip: The healthiest and tastiest sun-dried tomatoes you can buy from a health shop. They are rich in flavour and aren't soaked in oil, containing no nutrition.
